subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Pau Gasol tipped in a missed jumper by Kobe Bryant with a half-second left, and the Lakers eliminated the Thunder in Game 6 of their first-round playoff series.
snippet: Pau Gasol tipped in a missed jumper by Kobe Bryant with a half-second left, and the Lakers eliminated the Thunder in Game 6 of their first-round playoff series.
